name: DualShip Shooter
description:
A 2D shoot-em-up, with two different colors of enemies and two different colors of bullets.

Kills the enemies by shooting them with the bullet of the matching color. And make as many points as you can!

CONTROLS WASDMoveRIGHT CLICKShootLEFT CLICK / SPACESwitch color CREDITS

A game made for the Global Game Jam 2022 "Duality" by

  • Alejandro Pérez Bueno   |   https://github.com/madebypixel02
  • Daniel Pavón Gómez   |   https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-pav%C3%B3n-690747202/
  • S. Lucas Serrano   |   https://www.linkedin.com/in/s-lucasserrano/

Vote for us on the GGJ site! https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/dualship-shooter-9
